data.title: Schematic Structure of Biography of Artist
data.meta_description: schematic structure of biography of artist - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document outlines a typical schematic structure used in biographies of artists throughout history. It includes sections that describe the artist's life from pre-birth through death and beyond, including portents at birth, signs of early talent, major commissions, descriptions of late works, circumstances of death, and the fate of the artist's body and works after death. The structure seeks to provide a rich understanding of the cultural figure of the artist through examining their life and career within the discourse of history.
